overview: February 12, 1999 from The Madhouse of Extreme in New York City.  Chris Chetti vs. Little Guido  Balls Mahoney & Axl Rotten vs. Danny Doring & Roadkill  Super Crazy vs. Yoshihiro Tajiri  Sabu vs. Skull Von Krush  Sabu vs. Taz  Kronus vs. Steve Corino  The Dudleys vs. The Gangstas  ECW World Television Championship Match  Rob Van Dam vs. Jerry Lynn
title: ECW Crossing The Line 1999
